gw.api.admin

Class DestinationMessageStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.admin.DestinationMessageStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.service.data.Idable, java.io.Serializable

    public class DestinationMessageStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.service.data.Idable, java.io.Serializable
    Represents statistics about messages in the Guidewire messaging system (see the Integration Guide for details of messaging). Each DestinationMessageStatistics object represents statistics for a particular messaging destination:
    • The destination id.
    • The destination name.
    • The destination status (such as "started" or "suspended").
    • The number of failed messages for the destination.
    • The number of retried messages for the destination.
    • The number of messages currently in flight for the destination.
    • The number of pending unsent messages for the destination.
    DestinationMessageStatistics objects are used to display messaging status in the administration UI.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean Async
      Is destination asynchronous, ie. does it define a reply plugin.
      int AwaitingRetry
      The number of messages that have failed at least once and are awaiting further processing
      int BatchSize
      The batch size of messages that are actively queued for processing
      int DestinationId
      the destination id.
      java.lang.String DestinationName
      the destination name as defined in the messaging configuration.
      int Error
      number of messages in error for the destination
      java.lang.String Id
      int Inflight
      number of inflight messages for the destination
      DestinationMessageStatistics.DestinationAction[] ResumeSuspendOptions
      Returns the options for suspending/resuming inbound/outbound message processing for the destination based on the status of the destination.
      int RetryableError
      number of messages in retryable error for the destination
      java.lang.String Status
      the destination status.
      MessageProcessingDirection SuspendedStatus
      If the destination is suspended, returns the suspended status of the destination. Returns null otherwise.
      int TotalFailed
      Gets the total failed messages.
      int TotalUnsent
      Gets the total unsent messages.
      int Unsent
      number of unsent messages for the destination
